# GroupDocs.Signature for Node.js via Java

Node.js SDK to **sign, verify, search, and remove digital signatures** in 90+ file formats (PDF, Word, Excel, Images). Supports barcode, QR code, image, text, form field, and certificate-based (X.509, PKCS#7) signatures.

## Key Features

- Add signatures to PDFs, DOCX, XLSX, PPTX, PNG, etc.
- Digital signing with certificates (.pfx)
- Verify and remove existing signatures
- Support for QR, barcode, image, stamp, metadata, and text signatures
- NodeJS 3.6+ / Flask / Django / async support
- Works on Windows, Linux, macOS, Docker, Cloud

## Install

```bash
npm install @groupdocs/groupdocs.signature
```

## Code Snippet How to Sign a PDF File using Node.js

```js
  const signature = new groupdocs.signature.Signature(pdfFilePath);

  // Create QR code sign options
  const options = new groupdocs.signature.QrCodeSignOptions('JohnSmith');

  // Setup QR code encoding type
  options.setEncodeType(groupdocs.signature.QrCodeTypes.QR);
  
  // Set signature position
  options.setLeft(100);
  options.setTop(100);

  // Sign document to file
  signature.sign(outputFilePath, options);
```
